description: This file defines the main feed screen for a Flutter app, rendering story discovery interface including story cards, transitions, and interactions such as liking/disliking stories and posting new stories. It manages state, animations, and integrates with provider for story data.

classes.name: FeedScreen
classes.description: StatefulWidget that displays the main story feed with transitions and a floating button to post stories.

classes.name: _FeedScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the UI and interactions within FeedScreen, including handling provider initialization, rendering story cards, and dialog interactions.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: StatelessWidget displaying the empty state when no stories are available, with option to reshuffle stories.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the FeedScreen widget.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes the story feed provider when the widget's dependencies change.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget subtree for the feed screen including app bar, story card display, and floating action button.

methods.name: onReshuffle
methods.description: Callback invoked to reshuffle stories when in empty state.
